Name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
Description: Pikachu-exclusive Z-Move. High critical hit ratio.

Name: Absorb
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Acrobatics
Description: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

Name: After You
Description: Gives target priority in the next turn.

Name: Anchor Shot
Description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

Name: Ancient Power
Description: May raise all user's stats at once.

Name: Aqua Ring
Description: Restores a little HP each turn.

Name: Aromatherapy
Description: Cures all status problems in your party.

Name: Aromatic Mist
Description: Raises Special Defense of an ally.

Name: Assist
Description: User performs a move known by its allies at random.

Name: Assurance
Description: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

Name: Attract
Description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

Name: Aura Wheel
Description: Changes type based on Morpeko's Mode.

Name: Aurora Veil
Description: Halves damage from Physical and Special attacks for five turns.

Name: Autotomize
Description: Reduces weight and sharply raises Speed.

Name: Avalanche
Description: Power doubles if user took damage first.

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Description: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

Name: Baneful Bunker
Description: Protects the user and poisons opponent on contact.

Name: Baton Pass
Description: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

Name: Beak Blast
Description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

Name: Beat Up
Description: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

Name: Body Press
Description: The higher the user's Defense, the stronger the attack.

Name: Bolt Beak
Description: If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

Name: Bounce
Description: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

Name: Bouncy Bubble
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Breaking Swipe
Description: Hits multiple opponents and lowers their attack.

Name: Brick Break
Description: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

Name: Brine
Description: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

Name: Brutal Swing
Description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

Name: Bug Bite
Description: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

Name: Burn Up
Description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

Name: Burning Jealousy
Description: Hits all opponents, and burns any that have had their stats boosted.

Name: Calm Mind
Description: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

Name: Camouflage
Description: Changes user's type according to the location.

Name: Captivate
Description: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

Name: Celebrate
Description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

Name: Charge
Description: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

Name: Circle Throw
Description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Name: Clamp
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Clangorous Soul
Description: Raises all user's stats but loses HP.

Name: Clear Smog
Description: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

Name: Close Combat
Description: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Coaching
Description: Boosts Attack and Defense of a teammate.

Name: Coil
Description: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

Name: Constrict
Description: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

Name: Conversion
Description: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

Name: Conversion 2
Description: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

Name: Core Enforcer
Description: Scorches a 'Z' pattern on the ground.

Name: Cosmic Power
Description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Counter
Description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Name: Court Change
Description: Swaps the effects on either side of the field.

Name: Covet
Description: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

Name: Crafty Shield
Description: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

Name: Cross Poison
Description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

Name: Crush Grip
Description: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

Name: Curse
Description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

Name: Dark Void
Description: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

Name: Decorate
Description: Sharply raises target's Attack and Special Attack.

Name: Defend Order
Description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Defog
Description: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

Name: Destiny Bond
Description: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

Name: Detect
Description: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

Name: Dig
Description: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

Name: Disable
Description: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

Name: Dive
Description: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Name: Double Iron Bash
Description: Hits twice in one turn; may cause flinching.

Name: Dragon Ascent
Description: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Dragon Hammer
Description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

Name: Dragon Tail
Description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Name: Drain Punch
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Draining Kiss
Description: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Dream Eater
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

Name: Dual Wingbeat
Description: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

Name: Dynamax Cannon
Description: Damage doubles if opponent is Dynamaxed.

Name: Earthquake
Description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

Name: Electric Terrain
Description: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

Name: Electrify
Description: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

Name: Electro Ball
Description: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

Name: Encore
Description: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

Name: Endeavor
Description: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

Name: Endure
Description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

Name: Entrainment
Description: Makes target's ability same as user's.

Name: Eruption
Description: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

Name: Eternabeam
Description: User can't move on the next turn.

Name: Expanding Force
Description: Increases power and hits all opponents on Psychic Terrain.

Name: Extreme Evoboost
Description: Eevee-exclusive Z-Move. Sharply raises all stats.

Name: Facade
Description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

Name: Fairy Lock
Description: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

Name: Fake Out
Description: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

Name: False Swipe
Description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

Name: Feint
Description: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

Name: Fell Stinger
Description: Drastically raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

Name: Final Gambit
Description: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

Name: Fire Fang
Description: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

Name: Fire Lash
Description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

Name: Fire Pledge
Description: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

Name: Fire Spin
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: First Impression
Description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

Name: Fishious Rend
Description: If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

Name: Flail
Description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

Name: Flare Blitz
Description: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

Name: Flatter
Description: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

Name: Flip Turn
Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Name: Floral Healing
Description: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

Name: Flower Shield
Description: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

Name: Fly
Description: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Name: Flying Press
Description: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

Name: Focus Punch
Description: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

Name: Follow Me
Description: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

Name: Foresight
Description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

Name: Freeze Shock
Description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

Name: Freeze-Dry
Description: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

Name: Frost Breath
Description: Always results in a critical hit.

Name: Fusion Bolt
Description: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

Name: Fusion Flare
Description: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.
